title: Welcome to the Future of AI with Release and NVIDIA
description: Bringing self-service AI environments tailored for NVIDIA's powerful GPUs to your fingertips.
featureTitle: Democratizing AI Training, Testing and Deployment
featureList:
• Release is thrilled to be an NVIDIA Inception Program Partner working on cutting edge technologies and solutions for our joint customers.
  • Together we unlock the value in your data by automating the creation of full-stack AI applications for NVIDIA GPUs.
  • Want to join the preview program for new products we're building? Email us at partner@release.com
betterDescription: Release and NVIDIA partner to help organizations deploy and manage AI environments with ease, bringing powerful GPU capabilities to your development workflow.
betterCards:
Automated AI Environments

Release automates the creation of AI environments on the NVIDIA stack, offering a seamless, cost-effective solution for accessing the computational power of GPUs.

Tailored for Your Needs

Customize your AI technology stack with everything from frameworks and foundation models to tools and inference engines, all deployed in your AI infrastructure automatically.

Ephemeral AI Environments

Optimize costs and enhance security with ephemeral AI environments that are activated only when needed, and equipped with guardrails to prevent data mishaps.
